target: You have successfully booked the appointment.
context: <user>  I need to book an appointment for the salon. <system>  Okay, what is the name of the salon? And on what date would you like to book the appointment? Which time do you prefer? <user>  I need to go to the salon on March 3rd, preferably in the evening 5:45 slot at Linda Hair & Nails. <system>  Would you confirm booking an appointment at 5:45 pm on the day after tomorrow for Linda Hair & Nails? <user>  That would be fine. <system>  Would booking the appointment at 6 pm on the day after tomorrow at Linda Hair & Nails, be all right? I could not book it for 5:45. <user>  That would be all right. <system>
